questions.question: In submerged arc welding, the welding current is primarily responsible for:

answers.a: Generating heat to melt the base metal and filler wire
answers.b: Controlling the speed of the welding process
answers.c: Providing a shielding gas to protect the weld pool
answers.d: Controlling the arc length during welding

explainations.b: Your are Wrong, Option "a" is correct answer
explainations.c: Your are Wrong, Option "a" is correct answer
explainations.d: Your are Wrong, Option "a" is correct answer
